name: Final Fright - Prototype
description:
Controls:

(Should also support controllers, but I haven't tested)

Move = Arrow keys

Jump = Space bar

Sprint = Double tap left/right arrow

Pause = Escape

Confirm UI = Spacebar or X

Cancel UI = Z


Credits:

Background sky: https://digitalmoons.itch.io/pixel-skies-demo

Ground tiles: https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-farm
